quote: That’s always seemed so ridiculous to me, that people would want to be around someone because they’re pretty. It’s like picking your breakfast cereals based on color instead of taste.
quote_letters: THATS ALWAYS SEEMED SO RIDICULOUS TO ME THAT PEOPLE WOULD WANT TO BE AROUND SOMEONE BECAUSE THEYRE PRETTY ITS LIKE PICKING YOUR BREAKFAST CEREALS BASED ON COLOR INSTEAD OF TASTE
